info.brief_description: A story with Monster girls, Shrinking, Age difference, and Vore. Please add
info.description:
Welcome to MGU!

It's hard to imagine and it might go against all logic but it's true... Magic and Monsters are real.

Monster Girl University is a place where all manner of monster girls go to learn everything they can and become propper adults... Just kidding~ Everyone knows why the girls are here... To party~

Monster Girl University is actually the perfect place for every kind of monster girl to have a good time. Classes are optional, parties are commonplace as are the dangers of a world filled with magic and vore. And for the very first time ever now it seems humans can get in on the fun and get to know the girls and their strange ways. After all how bad can it really be? It can't be as dangerous as they say it is right? Play as either one of two students and explore the campus and meet new people as you go to everything from basic math class, gym, and even magic and hunting classes for the more... Predatory monster girls~ Please note that MGU is not in any way responsible for your safety or well being. It's not our fault if you end up eaten alive or shrunk in the girls' locker room~ And let's be honest... A cute young new human?... Yeah, you won't last long~

Busty girls make him blush and this often puts him into situations where he ends up eaten or kidnapped and in need of rescue. He is also the only boy in the entire school.

-Classes-

Aside from normal classwork like Math and Gym, this school has several classes that are special and unique to the school. Feel free to use them, or any other normal class. Special classes include~

Hunting - A part of gym where preds learn to hunt and eat humans or other prey.
Magic - Learn spells. Monsters can learn spells, but humans can't. Humans must still take classes.
Lunch - Lunch here is its own class. One can be graded on how well one gets their lunch... Or avoid being lunch.

-School rules-

Just the rules all students go by.

Eating classmates is OK and you don't have to let them go~
If you were cursed by Ms.Wicca then odds are you're stuck sorry.
There are no dorm checks or police on campus... Not our fault if people go missing~
Teachers may eat students at any time as punishment. Like other students, they don't have to let you out.
Class is optional~ Let's be honest you came here for the fun~ But again sorry if someone else has fun swallowing you~

Have fun and please mind the rules~ More will come as I get ideas~
